mapper.update:
UPDATE permission
id = #{id},
name = #{name},
typePermission = #{typePermission},
typeData = #{typeData},
typeSys = #{typeSys},
type = #{type},
code = #{code},
parentCode = #{parentCode},
level = #{level},
bag = #{bag},
clazz = #{clazz},
method = #{method},
parameter = #{parameter},
parameterVal = #{parameterVal},
skipUrl = #{skipUrl},
value1 = #{value1},
value2 = #{value2},
value3 = #{value3},
value4 = #{value4},
remark = #{remark},
addDate = #{addDate},
addUser = #{addUser},
addIp = #{addIp},
modifiedDate = #{modifiedDate},
modifiedUser = #{modifiedUser},
modifiedIp = #{modifiedIp},
WHERE
AND modified = #{original}
